price: Пеш аз он қавми Нуҳро, ки гурӯҳе нофармон буданд [ҳалок кардем]
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
